content: weekend to show you how to attach the squares which is simple and requires no seaming please note that i cannot provide individual crochet instruction if you d like to join the crochet-a-long there is a thread in my ravelry group here 9 note - random scrap yarn is used in pictures to the left fingering weight on a us d hook 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/casapinka/topics/4020670 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/olive-pink 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=wm633q1y_e8 4 https //www youtube com/watch v=de-annzeylk 5 https //www youtube com/watch v=xdfnbethp0g 6 https //www youtube com/watch v=7v-mssy5rku 7 https //www youtube com/watch v=wgvokqcf5qw 8 https //www youtube com/watch v=5xkssksknzo 9 https //www ravelry com/discuss/casapinka/topics/4020670
